definitions.definition: A lawnmower, a machine used to cut grass.
A person who cuts grass.
Unable to move, because of heavy snow.
A deed or similar document by which the title to property is conveyed between parties.
A handgun with a revolving chamber enabling several shots to be fired without reloading.
(by extension) Any (personal) firearm with such a mechanism.
Synonym of revolving line of credit
Agent noun of revolve; something that revolves.
(used with "of") To eliminate or to get rid of something.
definitions.example: I dispose of my trash in the garbage can.

definitions.definition: To distribute or arrange; to put in place.
To deal out; to assign to a use.
To incline.
definitions.example: In these uncertain times, I am disposed towards caution.

definitions.definition: To bargain; to make terms.
To regulate; to adjust; to settle; to determine.
Inclined; minded.
(in combination) Having a certain disposition.

definitions.definition: Inclined to mirth; jolly.
(of a delivery, exchange, etc., of physical goods) conducted without human-to-human contact so as to improve ease of use or reduce the potential spread of a contagious disease; contact-free.
That does not use or require contact in order to operate.
That has no contact(s).
The act of gliding.
A transitional sound, especially a semivowel.
An attack or preparatory movement made by sliding down the opponent’s blade, keeping it in constant contact.
A bird, the glede or kite.
A kind of cap affixed to the base of the legs of furniture to prevent it from damaging the floor.
The joining of two sounds without a break.
A smooth and sliding step in dancing the waltz.
To move softly, smoothly, or effortlessly.
To fly unpowered, as of an aircraft. Also relates to gliding birds and flying fish.
To cause to glide.
To pass with a glide, as the voice.
A sudden percussive noise.

definitions.definition: A strike upon an object causing such a noise.
An explosion.
The symbol !, known as an exclamation point.
definitions.example: An e-mail address with an ! is called a bang path.

definitions.definition: A factorial, in mathematics, because the factorial of n is often written as n!
An act of sexual intercourse.
An offbeat figure typical of reggae songs and played on guitar and piano.
An explosive product.

definitions.definition: An injection, a shot (of a narcotic drug).
(Boston area) An abrupt left turn.
Strong smell (of)

definitions.definition: A thrill.
To make sudden loud noises, and often repeatedly, especially by exploding or hitting something.
definitions.example: My head was banging after drinking all night at the concert.

definitions.definition: To hit hard.
definitions.example: David and Mary banged into each other.

definitions.definition: To engage in sexual intercourse.
definitions.example: We can hear the couple banging upstairs.

definitions.definition: (with "in") To hammer or to hit anything hard.
definitions.example: Hold the picture while I bang in this nail.

definitions.definition: To cut squarely across, as the tail of a horse, or a person's forelock; to cut (the hair).
To inject intravenously.

definitions.definition: Right, directly.
definitions.example: The passenger door was bang against the garage wall.

definitions.definition: Precisely.
definitions.example: He arrived bang on time.

definitions.definition: With a sudden impact.
definitions.example: Distracted, he ran bang into the opening door.

definitions.definition: A sudden percussive sound, such as made by the firing of a gun, slamming of a door, etc.
definitions.example: He pointed his finger at her like a gun and said, "Bang!"

definitions.definition: Hair hanging over the forehead.
A hairstyle including such hair, especially cut straight across the forehead.

Cannabis, especially as used in the Indian subcontinent.
The act of stipulating; a contracting or bargaining; an agreement.
Something that is stated or stipulated as a condition of an agreement.

definitions.definition: The situation, arrangement, and structure of the stipules.
A goal to be achieved in a chess problem; for example, to checkmate Black within a specified number of moves.
(grammar) A verb form that indicates an ongoing action or state in the present and which can function as an adjective.
The act of deporting or exiling, or the state of being deported; banishment; transportation.
A woman who attends a bride during her wedding ceremony, as part of the main wedding party.

definitions.definition: (entertainment) A person or team that perennially finishes well, but never first.
To act as a bridesmaid for; to attend a bride during her wedding ceremony.

A bivalve mollusk of many kinds, especially those that are edible; for example the soft-shell clam (Mya arenaria), the hard clam (Mercenaria mercenaria), the sea clam or hen clam (Spisula solidissima), and other species. The name is said to have been given originally to the Tridacna gigas, a huge East Indian bivalve.
Strong pincers or forceps.
A kind of vise, usually of wood.
A dollar (usually used in the plural).

A vagina.
One who clams up; a taciturn person, one who refuses to speak.

A crash or clangor made by ringing all the bells of a chime at once.

A person (usually a woman) who dyes or bleaches their hair a shade of blonde.
The deltoid muscle, a triangular muscle on the human shoulder.
The deltoid ligament, a triangular ligament on the human ankle.
A strong vertical post of timber or iron, fixed to the ground and/or on the deck of a ship, to which the ship's mooring lines etc are secured.

Equality; comparability of strength or intensity.
Senses related to classification into two sets.

The number of times a sow has farrowed.
An avoirdupois ounce, weighing 1/16 of an avoirdupois pound, or 28.3495 grams.
A troy ounce, weighing 1/12 of a troy pound, or 480 grains, or 31.1035 grams.
A US fluid ounce, with a volume of 1/16 of a US pint, 1.8047 cubic inches or 29.5735 millilitres.
A British imperial fluid ounce, with a volume of 1/20 of an imperial pint, 1.7339 cubic inches or 28.4131 millilitres.
A little bit.

definitions.definition: A large wild feline, such as a lynx or cougar.
Now specifically, the snow leopard, Uncia uncia.
To cheer, to cheer up, to gladden, to make happy.

definitions.definition: Brisk and fresh.

A vascular organ in mammals, except monotremes and marsupials, present only in the female during gestation. It supplies food and oxygen from the mother to the foetus, and passes back waste. It is implanted in the wall of the uterus and links to the foetus through the umbilical cord. It is expelled after birth.
It is an endocrine gland which secret human chorionic gonadotropin hormone.The HCG if detected in woman's urine then the pregnancy is confirmed.
In flowering plants, the part of the ovary where ovules develop; in non-flowering plants where the spores develop.
